com.cloudbees.hudson.plugins.modeling.im.description: Setting up of a Build Artifact

template-attribute.name: api
template-attribute.helpHtml:
Enter the IP Address and port of the API server.
Example: 192.168.10.10:1024

template-attribute.name: cred
template-attribute.helpHtml:
Select API Server Credential.
Make sure that API Server Credentials were already stored under Jenkins Global Credentials.

template-attribute.name: check1
template-attribute.displayName: Create a New Build Artifact Volume ?
template-attribute.helpHtml:
Check the box if a new build artifact volume needs to be created.
Leave it unchecked if the build artifact volume was already created.

template-attribute.name: vol
template-attribute.helpHtml:
Provide the Build Artifact Volume Name.
If the previous checkbox was checked then a new Build Artifact will be created with the name provided in this field.
But if the previous checkbox is unchecked then an existing Build Artifact with the name provided in this field will be used.

template-attribute.name: vs
template-attribute.helpHtml:
Provide the name of the Storage Tenant.
Storage Tenant names can be listed by using the "List Vserver and Aggregates (NetApp)" step.

template-attribute.name: ag
template-attribute.helpHtml:
Provide the name of the Aggregate.
Aggregate names can be listed by using the "List Vserver and Aggregates (NetApp)" step.

template-attribute.name: size
template-attribute.displayName: Volume Size for Build Artifactory (in MB)
template-attribute.helpHtml: Provide volume Size for Build Artifactory (in MB)

template-attribute.name: base
template-attribute.displayName: Name of CI Development Branch to Clone
template-attribute.helpHtml: Provide name of CI Development Branch to Clone.

template-attribute.name: snap
template-attribute.displayName: Name of the Checkpoint to Clone
template-attribute.helpHtml:
Provide name of the Checkpoint to Clone.
Checkpoint can be listed by using the "List Checkpoint and Workspace (NetApp)" step.

template-attribute.name: clone
template-attribute.helpHtml: Provide the name for the clone to be archived.

template-attribute.name: cont
template-attribute.displayName: Name of the Slave Container for Archival
template-attribute.helpHtml: This label name is used uniquely identify the slave container in the build archival execution step

template-attribute.name: mntvol
template-attribute.displayName: Mount Path for Build Artifact Volume
template-attribute.helpHtml:
Provide the Mount Path for Build Artifact Volume.
Example: /tmp/vol1/

template-attribute.name: mntclone
template-attribute.helpHtml:
Provide the Mount Path for Cloned Volume.
Example: /tmp/vol2/

com.cloudbees.hudson.plugins.modeling.im.help: This step will set up a build artifactory volume.
